alert.note: Alert for Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:24PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Waushara County through 800 PM CDT... At 723 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Westfield, or 11 miles west of Wautoma, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Waushara County, including the following locations... Dakota, Coloma and Richford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
